channel.title: Boys posing as girls
channel.description:
You know boys that pose as girls, right? (Tranquil in eg.) Well, Private servers are fucking filled with them. No matter how obvious it is to people with brains, the retards fall for it ALL THE TIME. They're all mods because they beg the owner and have e-sex with them. I officially quit playing all private servers unless zoltanman finishes his server (He won't, he quit programming). So, heres the pics lol.
I'm chiz [img]http://img181.imageshack.us/img181/1354/dumbshemaleyk8.png[/img]
And soon afterwards: [img]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/3368/dumbshemale1ue8.png[/img]
[s]EDIT: I think I'll just DDoS and request all shemales to be removed.
Ok, about to attack the site, then use a IP mask when they've IP'd me.[/s]

item.title: Boys posing as girls
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:18, topic:206909”]@ninja nub: I have seen something spectacular from you at all. You fail to contribute to the community in any way, shape or form. Your constant negativity is causing more harm than good. I wouldn’t mind if your posts contained suggestion, but yours just contain complete garble.

This is such bullshit. Why must their be that one group of people who think they’re so fucking cool to go around insulting people for no reason? I wish MITB would go back to it’s original state.

You have no fucking idea you prepubescent moron. Us group of people are the guys who were here long before you were. We know what the community once was and how it is going. We the the individuals who keep the forum alive and active with our constant advice and superior intelligence. WE run this community, not a complete fuck wit who is under the impression that he is ‘old school’.

May i also point out that you chose the wrong company. I understand that you share your moronic opinions with legit and fastbawlz. The truth is, they wouldn’t know what they are doing if i hopped and vent and shouted it at them.[/quote]

I agree with you in every way, except the part about him running in the same circle as us. If anything ninja nub is a little queef who made the whole issue between us and Greeny an opportunity to flame Legit and the rest of the gang. Ninja nub is just one of the little retards that have yet to find friends.

Read full topic

item.title: Boys posing as girls
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

^^ QFT

Too many kids think they’re old school. There is no fixing this forum, it’s too screwed up. Best thing is to stop moaning about it and just let things run their course.

I suggested months ago disconnecting moparisthebest from moparscape by changing the domain. I saw that as the only plausible option, but I doubt that will work anymore. If we really wanted to rejuvenate the forums we’d have to move elsewhere. It’s just so prone to failure no-one wants to do it. ECAB crashed and burned before a month was up and Javacisnotrecognized didn’t last an awful long time either.

Read full topic
